meanings.definition: To combine into a single unit.
meanings.sent1: She unitizes the puzzle pieces to create a complete picture.
meanings.sent2: The factory unitizes different parts to assemble the final product.
meanings.sent3: The chef unitizes various ingredients to cook a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: His leadership unitizes the team, making them work together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The artist unitizes colors to paint a beautiful masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To make into a single unit.

meanings.sent2: The company unitizes its resources for efficient operations.
meanings.sent3: The magician unitizes different tricks to create a mesmerizing show.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness unitizes people, bringing them closer together.
meanings.sent5: The conductor unitizes the musicians to produce harmonious music.
